[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
The same exchange happened at the supermarket afterward.
I’ll probably be unable to go near that shopping district for a while out of awkwardness.
……Well, if you say it's an endearing trait for a cat, I suppose it is.
VANILLA: "Hm? Kunnkun, kunnkun…"
VANILLA: "There’s a really nice smell coming from over there."
CHOCOLA: "You're right! There's a wonderfully savory and good smell, Master!"
KASHO: "Indeed. This scent..."
Turns his face towards the direction of the smell.
STALL CAT: "Welcome!"
STALL CAT: "How about some freshly made takoyaki?"
STALL CAT: "Hot, hot takoyaki with plenty of bonito flakes, how about it?"
CHOCOLA: "Wow, a cat’s takoyaki stand! How unusual, Master!"

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
[Chocola]: "I'll try my best to be a good girl!"
[Vanilla]: "Shigure is strict. But thanks to her, I’ve learned a lot."
[Shopkeeper]: "Is that so? You have a wonderful Master, then?"
[Chocola]: "Ah, but Master is Master!"
[Chocola]: "Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan after all! Right, Master?"
[Vanilla]: "Translating it, Shigure is an important friend."
[Vanilla]: "Calling him 'Master' is only for this Master."
[Shopkeeper]: "Haha. You’re loved, aren't you, Master?"
[Kashou]: "Well, I am grateful."
I'm lightly nudged with an elbow.
I reply with a slightly embarrassed wry smile.
…It's rather embarrassing to be this flustered in public.

Question:
無慈悲な電子音が響く携帯電話を見つめる。
……時雨と連絡さえ付けば、すぐに解決すると思ってたのに。
[ショコラ]: 「はむ、んぐんぐんぐ、朝ごはんおいしーですね！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまのごはんはいつでもおいしーですにゃー♪」
[バニラ]: 「ショコラ、ほっぺにケチャップ付いてる」
[バニラ]: 「芸術的にかわいい。舐めてあげちゃう。ぺろぺろ」
当の本人たちはサンドウィッチを満足そうに頬張っている。
ちなみに中身はトマトとチーズとレタス。
それに半熟の目玉焼きを挟み込んだシンプルなもの。
朝食だったらまぁこんなもんだろ。
[嘉祥]: 「お前ら、今日こそは家に帰るんだからな？」
reference_answer:
As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.
... And here I thought that I could sort all this out if I could just talk to Shigure.
[Chocola]: 「Munch munch munch, breakfast tastes good!」
[Chocola]: 「Master's breakfast always tastes good, meow~ ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「Chocola, there's some ketchup on your cheek.」
[Vanilla]: 「It's cutely artistic. I'll lick it off. Shlurp slurp~」
The catgirls in question were happily stuffing themselves with sandwiches.
These sandwiches incidentally contained tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With an over-easy fried egg tucked inside all of that, it was a simple meal.
Breakfast was pretty much like this.
[Kashou]: 「You two are definitely going home today, okay?」
ModelAnswer:
A merciless electronic sound echoes as I stare at my phone.
……I thought if I could just contact Shigure, it would be resolved immediately.
CHOCOLA: "Ham, ungungun, breakfast is delicious!"
CHOCOLA: "Master’s cooking is always delicious nya~♪"
VANILLA: "Chocola, you have ketchup on your cheeks."
VANILLA: "It's cute in an artistic way. I’ll lick it off. Pero pero"
The ones involved are happily munching on their sandwiches.
By the way, the filling is tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With a half-cooked fried egg sandwiched inside—a simple one.
That’s pretty standard for breakfast, right?
KASHO: "You two, you're really going home today, aren’t you?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
A bright smile accompanies the offering of a receipt and pen.
MINADUKI KASHO: "Right, um..."
The received receipt is re-examined.
MINADUKI KASHO: "…It seems like I didn’t order this."
DISHERY MERCHANT: "…Really?"
DISHERY MERCHANT: "So, the items are different...?"
MINADUKI KASHO: "No, it looks like everything I ordered is here..."
His gaze turns towards the stacked cardboard boxes within the store.
A mountain, mountain, mountain of cardboard boxes piled up inside the small shop.
It was almost entirely filled with cardboard boxes.
MINADUKI KASHO: "As you can see, we don’t need this many dishes at my place…"
DISHERY MERCHANT: "S-sorry! I'll confirm with headquarters immediately!"
DISHERY MERCHANT: "Could you wait just a moment?!"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
[Dishware Merchant]: "It seems there was a mix-up with another order..."
[Dishware Merchant]: "I believe you, Minaduki-sama, will need these soon…"
[Dishware Merchant]: "If it’s alright with you, would you be willing to accept the dishes for your order?"
[Kashou]: "Receive the order...? "
[Kashou]: "…Eh? From within this?"

Towering stacks of cardboard boxes.

I involuntarily find myself speechless.

They're all the same box, after all.

You won’t know what’s inside until you open them.

And looking at the receipts, they're all top-grade tea sets and tableware.

So, if you don't handle them with extreme care, something terrible will happen.
[Kashou]: "Um, I would be grateful if I could receive them today as I also have preparations to do for the opening…"
[Kashou]: "…But doing all of this right now? It’ll take a considerable amount of time, won't it?"

This amount would easily take two hours or more…
And if I request a redelivery, it’ll just be double the trouble…

[Chocola & Vanilla]: "Jii"
[Minaduki Kashou]: "I found cat paws!!"

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……ネコくらい単純に生きられれば、色々と楽なんだろうけどな」
窓に貼られている店の名前に目を向けながら。
苦笑いを振り払って、届いたばかりのティーセットを片付け始めた。
[バニラ]: 「あれ、今日はあのたこ焼き屋がいない」
昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。
[ショコラ]: 「……え？　あ、ご、ごめんバニラ！」
[ショコラ]: 「何だっけ、マタタビだっけ？」
[バニラ]: 「だいたいそんな感じ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "……If only I could live as simply as a cat, things would be so much easier."
Looking at the shop name posted on the window.
Shaking off a wry smile, he began putting away the tea set he had just received.
Vanilla: "Oh? The takoyaki vendor isn't here today."
The park street in the evening, just like yesterday.
But there are no stalls to be seen today.
I was planning to send the cats back home, but for some reason, nobody’s around.
I also left my house keys at my place.
So I went shopping to pass the time until Shigure gets home.
Chocola: "……Huh? A-ah, sorry Vanilla!"
Chocola: "What was it? Catnip, right?"
Vanilla: "Something like that."

Question:

[ショコラ]: 「でも大丈夫ですから。心配かけてごめんなさい、ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあちょうどそこにベンチがあるし、少し休んでくか」

バニラに小銭を渡してショコラをベンチに促す。
よく吹き抜ける潮風が公園の木々をざわめかせる。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Chocola, if you're tired, would you like to rest a little?"
Chocola: "Ah, yes, just a little…"
Chocola: "But I’m alright. I don’t want to worry you, Master."
Minaduki Kashou: "…There's no need to apologize."
She lowers her head with a troubled smile.
The reason for her lack of energy is obvious.
So there’s nothing I can say.
Minaduki Kashou: "Then it’s good there's a bench over there, so let's rest a bit."
Vanilla: "I’ll go get some drinks then."
Minaduki Kashou: "Yeah, please do. For everyone."
Vanilla: "Understood. Consider it done."
He hands Vanilla some coins and encourages Chocola to sit on the bench.
A brisk sea breeze rustles through the trees in the park.

With a slight sense of unease about where they were going.

[時雨]: 「……自分にも頼ってもらえないのは、きっと寂しいことだと思いますよ？」
その笑顔に胸がズキリと痛む。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well, it's your own fault our clientele increased so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh? Just what might you be talking about?」
I decided not to press further.
Shigure smiled slightly and tilted her head in response.
If she was going to address that issue honestly, she would already have done so by now.
That's how Shigure had always been.
[Shigure]: 「I understand what you are saying, Nii-sama...」
[Shigure]: 「... but catgirls are clever. Clever enough to become family, and even lovers, to humans.」
[Shigure]: 「... And that's exactly why.」
She took a deep breath...
... and looked at me with a kind of troubled smile.
[Shigure]: 「... I think there would be a feeling of sadness to not be relied upon.」
Her smile stabbed at my heart.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "It's thanks to Shigure that we’ve had more customers than expected, but…"
Minaduki Shigure: "Oh, what are you talking about?"
I decided not to press her further.
Shigure gave a small smile and tilted her head in response. She wouldn’t answer directly if she could do so honestly. That's just how she's always been.
Minaduki Shigure: "I understand what brother says,"
Minaduki Shigure: "But cats are clever creatures. They can be family to humans, and partners too."
Minaduki Shigure: "…That’s why"
She paused for a breath then.
A troubled smile appeared on her face as she looked at me.
Minaduki Shigure: "…I bet it's lonely that you don't rely on me either, isn't it?"
My chest ached at that smile. Doki doki.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
携帯の画面を見て眉根を寄せる。
そのまま動かない時雨を見て着信元を察する。
[嘉祥]: 「実家からだろ？　早く出ないと」
[時雨]: 「……用件など出ずとも分かります。行き先を告げずに出て来たので」
時雨の手の中の携帯が鳴り止む。
同じように時雨も黙ったまま、
携帯をぎゅっと握り締める。
[時雨]: 「……私がまだ年端もいかぬ女だからですか？」
[時雨]: 「それとも、世間知らずの子どもだからですか？」
[時雨]: 「……だから、私はお父さまとお母さまの言うことに従わねばならないのでしょうか」
[時雨]: 「……私は、ここにいたいのです」
[時雨]: 「兄さまが苦しまれてる時くらい……せめて、お傍にいるだけでも……」
reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
She frowned, looking at the screen of her phone.
Seeing Shigure remain motionless, I guessed the caller.
MINADUKI KASHO: "It's your family home, right? You need to hurry and answer."
MINADUKI SHIGURE: "…Even without stating their business, I understand. They contacted me without revealing their destination."
The phone in Shigure’s hand stopped ringing.
Shigure also remained silent,
clutching the phone tightly.
MINADUKI SHIGURE: "…Is it because I'm still a girl too young to be independent?"
MINADUKI SHIGURE: "Or perhaps, because I’m an ignorant child?"
MINADUKI SHIGURE: "…Therefore, must I always obey my parents?"
MINADUKI SHIGURE: "…I want to stay here."
MINADUKI SHIGURE: "At least during times when my brother is suffering… even just being by his side…"

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: Bell (鈴) | Type: Accessory
Question:
[バニラ]: 「他の病院の場所は知らないし……道を聞ける人も、歩いてない……」
[バニラ]: 「でも、このまま帰るわけにも行かないし……どうしたら……」
不安でぎゅっと手を握り合う。
冷たいシャッターを見上げて下唇をきゅっと噛む。
[警察]: 「キミたち、何してるの？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ……警察さん！」
[ショコラ]: 「開いてる病院教えてもらえませんか！？」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまが大変で！　それで、お医者さん呼ぼうと思って！」
[バニラ]: 「病院が休みで、どうすればいいか分からなくて……」
[警察]: 「飼い主さんが？　それは大変だけど……」
[警察]: 「キミたち鈴は？　持ってないの？」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「あっ……！」
指摘されて首元に手を当てる。
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「We don't know any other clinics... and there aren't any people on the street to ask.」
[Vanilla]: 「We can't just go back like this... What should we...」
We gripped each other's hands tightly in worry.
Looking up at the cold shutters, we chewed our lips in concern.
[Police Officer]: 「What are you two doing there?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah... Ms. Policewoman!」
[Chocola]: 「Where's the closest open clinic?!」
[Chocola]: 「Master is in trouble, so we wanted to get a doctor!」
[Vanilla]: 「The clinic is closed and we don't know what to do...」
[Police Officer]: 「Your Master is? That's a quite a problem, but...」
[Police Officer]: 「Where are your Bells? Don't you have them?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Ah...!」
We touched our necks where she pointed.
ModelAnswer:
Vanilla: "I don't know the location of any other hospitals... and there's no one around to ask for directions, nobody walking by..."
Vanilla: "But I can’t just go home like this… what should I do…"
She clutches her hands tightly with anxiety.
Looking up at the cold shutter, she bites her lower lip.
Police Officer: "What are you two doing?"
Chocola: "Ah... Police officer!"
Chocola: "Could you tell us which hospital is open!?"
Chocola: "My master is in a lot of trouble! That’s why we were trying to call a doctor!"
Vanilla: "The hospitals are closed, and I don't know what to do…"
Police Officer: "Your owner?"
Police Officer: "That's rough... And what about your bell?"
Police Officer: "Don’t you have one?"
Chocola & Vanilla: "Ah..."
Noticing, they reach for their necks.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
朝イチから予想外の光景に頭がついて来てくれない。
[時雨]: 「おはようございます、兄さま」
[時雨]: 「私は今回の一件で色々と考えたのです」
晴れ晴れとした曇りの無い笑顔。
他のネコたちも同じように笑顔を俺に向けている。
つう、と冷たい汗が伝うのを感じながら、
[嘉祥]: 「はぁ……考えたって、何を……？」
何とかそれだけを口にする。
[時雨]: 「今回の一件で、兄さまに無理をするなというのが無理なことがよく分かりました」
[時雨]: 「ですが、私も妹として夜も眠れぬほど心配をさせられたのもまた事実……」
[時雨]: 「ならば人員を増やして、兄さまの負担を減らすのが一番の得策と、時雨は考えたのです」
[嘉祥]: 「…………はぁ」
reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
The unexpected scene from the very beginning made my head spin.
[Shigure]: "Good morning, Master."
[Shigure]: "I've been thinking a lot about this matter."
A bright, cloudless smile.
The other cats are also smiling in my direction.
I felt a cold sweat trickle down as *tsuu*, and somehow managed to get out just that much.
[Kashou]: "Haa… thinking about what...?"
[Shigure]: "Regarding this matter, I realized it was unreasonable to tell you not to push yourself."
[Shigure]: "However, the fact remains that as your sister, I also lost sleep worrying so much…"
[Shigure]: "Therefore, I think the best course of action is to increase personnel and reduce your burden."
[Kashou]: "…………Haa"

[Kashou]: 「No no no no.」

*Shigure turns to look at the cats.*

reference_answer:

Question:

ネコたちも、瞳を輝かせていた。

[バニラ]: 「良い」

[淡雪]: 「ほんと。切ってしまうのが、もったいないわねー」
[淡雪]: 「ずっと部屋に飾っておきたいくらい」
[時雨]: 「わかります、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「でしょう？」
reference_answer:
I've certainly gotten compliments from customers before, but getting one from my own mother is making me blush, oddly enough.
All of the catgirls have their eyes alight.
[Chocola]: 「That is so lovely, Master~!」
[Vanilla]: 「Very good.」
[Azuki]: 「I mean, I helped with it, but call me curious to see the finished product.」
[Maple]: 「You really went all out.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I-It looks so delicious~... Slurp.」
[Coconut]: 「Amazing... It's so cute. It almost feels like a shame to eat it!」
[Awayuki]: 「It really does. Cutting into it feels almost criminal.」
[Awayuki]: 「I want to just keep it as a room decoration forever.」
[Shigure]: 「I know how you feel, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「Right?」
ModelAnswer:
I receive compliments from customers sometimes, but I get strangely flustered when my mother says it.
The cats’ eyes were sparkling too.
[Chocola]: "It's wonderful, Master~!"
[Vanilla]: "Good."
[Azuki]: "Well, I helped with it, so I saw the finished product already, you know."
[Maple]: "You really put your heart into it."
[Cinnamon]: "Oh, looks delicious… *slurp*"
[Coconut]: "Amazing...so cute. It's a shame to eat it!"
[Awayuki]: "Really. It’s a shame to cut into it, isn’t it?"

[Shigure]: "I understand, Mother!"
[Awayuki]: "Right?"

Question:
[メイプル]: 「それだと食べられないので……切りますよ？」

[メイプル]: 「さくさくさく、っと」
メイプルがケーキに包丁を入れ、手早く切り分けていく。
[淡雪]: 「あらー……」
[淡雪]: 「なんだか、ネコたちも、ずいぶん手慣れたわね。包丁の扱いがプロみたいだわ」
[時雨]: 「お店で働いてますから、もうプロですよ、母様」
[淡雪]: 「あら、そうよね！　うふふ……頼もしいわね」
ケーキが切り分け終わった、そのときだった――
玄関のほうから、扉が開く音がする。
[時雨]: 「えっ！？」

reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「We won't be able to eat it if it spoils, so... it has to get cut.」
[Shigure]: 「You're right. It's a necessary evil. Please, do the deed, Maple.」
[Maple]: 「All right, slice, slice, slice.」
Maple puts the kitchen knife into the cake and quickly slices the cake into pieces.
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my...」
[Awayuki]: 「Seems the catgirls have become quite skilled themselves. She's handling the knife like a professional.」
[Shigure]: 「They all work in the shop, so they are professionals, Mother.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my, that's right! Tee hee hee... Such reliable girls.」
Once the cake is all sliced up, that's when it happens—
From the foyer, the sound of the door opening echoes.
[Shigure]: 「Huh?!」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, that sounds like your father opening the door. He must be back early today.」
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "If it's like that, I won’t be able to eat it... so should I cut it?"
Shigure: "That's right. There's nothing we can do about it, please go ahead, Maple."
Maple: "Saku saku saku, tto"
Maple inserts a knife into the cake and quickly cuts it into slices.
Awayuki: "Oh my..."
Awayuki: "The cats seem quite skilled too. Their handling of the knife is like professionals."
Shigure: "I work at a shop, so I'm already a professional, Mother."
Awayuki: "Oh, that’s right! Ufufu… you are dependable."
Just as the cake was cut,
a sound of the door opening came from the direction of the entrance.
Shigure: "Eh?!"
Awayuki: "Oh my, that way of opening the door... it's Father, isn't it? He seems to have come home early today.”

この男が、俺の父親――水無月州浜だ。
[時雨]: 「あの、父様……今夜は、商工会の寄合だったはずでは……？」
[州浜]: 「そうだが……私が帰宅すると、不都合でも？」
[時雨]: 「そ、そんなことは……」
[ショコラ]: 「あの！　ご主人さまのお父さま、お帰りなさーい！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人のお父上、予想外にお早いご帰宅」
[ココナツ]: 「お、お父さま、お帰りなさいませ！」
[州浜]: 「うむ」
[メイプル]: 「……これ、やばいんじゃないかしら？」
reference_answer:
My body freezes up from the tension.
The catgirls are also taken aback.
[Suhama]: 「...Hmph.」
This man is my father, Suhama Minaduki.
[Shigure]: 「Um, Father... I thought you had a community chamber get-together to attend tonight...?」
[Suhama]: 「I did. Is there something wrong with me coming back home?」
[Shigure]: 「N-No, that isn't what I meant...」
[Chocola]: 「Um! Welcome back home, Master's Father!」
[Vanilla]: 「Master's Father, you have returned earlier than we anticipated.」
[Coconut]: 「F-Father, welcome back!」
[Suhama]: 「Mm-hmm.」
[Maple]: 「...Hey, isn't this bad news?」
ModelAnswer:
I tense up, my body stiffening.
The cats also hold their breath.
[Suhama]: "…………Hmph."
This man is my father—Minaduki Suhama.
[Shigure]: “Um, Father… weren’t you at the Commerce Association gathering tonight?”
[Suhama]: “That's true... Is there something inconvenient about me returning home?”
[Shigure]: "N-no, not at all…"
[Chocola]: “Hey! Master’s father, welcome hoooome!”
[Vanilla]: “Master’s father, a surprisingly early return.”
[Coconut]: “O-father, welcome home!”
[Suhama]: “Hm.”
[Maple]: “…Could this be bad?”

Question:
[淡雪]: 「嬉しかったわよ。こんな賑やかなのは久しぶりだもの」
[淡雪]: 「お父さま、座ってはどうかしら。嘉祥のケーキ、とっても美味しそうでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「あ、そうです！　父様、今日こそ兄様のケーキを食べてください！」
[時雨]: 「食べてみれば、兄様が本気で打ちこんでいるってわかるはずです！」
俺は思わず息を呑んだ。父親が、俺の作ったケーキを食べるだろうか？
何と言うだろうか？
[ショコラ]: 「賛成です！　ご主人さまの美味しいケーキを食べれば、みんな仲良しにゃのです！」
[バニラ]: 「間違いない」
[ココナツ]: 「うんうん！　お兄ちゃんのケーキ、本当に美味しいんだから！」
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「I'm so glad that you did. It hasn't been this lively in quite some time, after all.」
[Awayuki]: 「Father, why not take a seat? Kashou's cake looks quite good, doesn't it?」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, yes! Father, today should be the day you partake in one of Nii-sama's cakes!」
[Shigure]: 「If you do, you will realize that Nii-sama has really devoted his all toward baking it!」
I find myself taken aback. Would Dad consider eating a cake I made?
What would he say?
[Chocola]: 「Chocola agrees! One bite of Master's delicious cake and everyone gets alyong!」
[Vanilla]: 「Without a shadow of a doubt.」
[Coconut]: 「Yeah! Yeah! Onii-chan's cakes are really good, after all!」
ModelAnswer:
Awayuki: "I was delighted. It's been a long time since it’s been so lively."
Awayuki: "Father, would you like to sit down? Kashou’s cake looks incredibly delicious, doesn't it?"
Shigure: "Oh, that's right! Father, please eat my brother's cake today!"
Shigure: "If you try it, you’ll understand how seriously my brother is working on it!"
I involuntarily held my breath. Will Father actually eat the cake I made?
What will he say?
Chocola: "I agree! If everyone eats Master’s delicious cake, we'll all be good friends!"
Vanilla: "That's certain."
Coconut: "Yeah yeah! My brother's cake is really delicious!"

Question:

いろいろなことが頭の中で駆け巡り、思考がごちゃごちゃになった。

[嘉祥]: 「あ……」
家の鍵もサイフも、全て鞄に入れて、置いてきてしまった。

[嘉祥]: 「そりゃそうだな」
鍵がなかったら、俺だけでなく２匹も家に入れないところだ。
reference_answer:
That's all I say before leaving the Minaduki house. Almost as if I'm running away.
I have so many things running through my mind that my thoughts are a jumbled mess.
Before I realize it, I'm standing in the park in the middle of the night.
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
I left my house keys, wallet, and everything else in my bag back at the house.
[Kashou]: 「...What am I even doing?」
[Chocola]: 「...Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Chocola...!」
[Vanilla]: 「You forgot this, Master.」
Vanilla is holding my bag.
[Kashou]: 「You fetched that for me, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Naturally. We can't camp outside.」
[Kashou]: 「Good point.」
Without the key to the house, not only would I be locked out, but so would these two.
ModelAnswer:
I said only that and left the Minaduki residence. As if fleeing.
Various things raced through my head, my thoughts jumbled.
When I realized it, I was in a nighttime park.
MINADUKI KASHO: "Ah..."
I'd put everything – my house key and wallet – in my bag and left them behind.
MINADUKI KASHO: "...What am I doing?"
CHOCOLA: "...Master"
MINADUKI KASHO: "Chocola—!"
VANILLA: "Master, you forgot something."
Vanilla’s hand held my bag.
MINADUKI KASHO: "You brought it, Vanilla?"
VANILLA: "Of course. I wouldn't want to rough it."
MINADUKI KASHO: "That's right."
Without the key, neither you two could have gotten back into the house.

[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ショコラたちは大丈夫です！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまは、大丈夫ですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ……もちろん」
[嘉祥]: 「……いや……どうかな？」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人、忘れ物を持ってきたご褒美はある？」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ？　何か欲しいのか？」
[バニラ]: 「あそこに自販機がある。温かい飲み物を買ってくる。今夜は冷える」
[嘉祥]: 「……わかった」
ご褒美と言ったが……バニラは、俺のために温かい飲み物を買ってきてくれるのだろう。
いつの間にか、ずいぶんと身体が冷えていた。
[バニラ]: 「どうぞ、ご主人」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうな、バニラ」
俺は買ってきてもらった缶コーヒーを受け取った。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「Chocola and Vanilla are fine!」
[Chocola]: 「But are you okay, Master?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah... Of course.」
[Kashou]: 「...Actually... I'm not sure.」
[Vanilla]: 「Master, do I get a reward for retrieving your bag?」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Did you want something?」
[Vanilla]: 「There is a vending machine over there. I'll buy some warm drinks. Tonight is chilly.」
[Kashou]: 「...Sure.」
Vanilla's calling it a 'reward', but... she's going off to buy a warm drink for me and not the other way around.
I do feel pretty darn cold, now that I realize it, though.
[Vanilla]: 「Here you go, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Hey, thanks, Vanilla.」
I take the can of coffee that Vanilla bought for me.
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: "The Chocolas are alright!"
Chocola: "Are you, Master, alright?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Ah… of course."
Minaduki Kashou: "...No... I wonder?"
Vanilla: "Master, is there a reward for bringing back something you forgot?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Eh? Do you want something?"
Vanilla: "There's a vending machine over there. Bring back a warm drink. It’ll be cold tonight."
Minaduki Kashou: "...Alright."
I said 'reward,' but… Vanilla will probably buy me a warm drink. 
I had become quite chilled without realizing it.
Vanilla: "Here, Master."
Minaduki Kashou: "Thank you, Vanilla."
I received the canned coffee she brought back.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
立ちあがって、前を向くしかない。
[ショコラ]: 「私も、いっしょに頑張ります！」
[バニラ]: 「応援する、ご主人」
[嘉祥]: 「……ありがとう」
[嘉祥]: 「また、頑張ってみるよ。いつか、親父に美味いって言わせてみせる」
[ショコラ]: 「そうですよ！」
[バニラ]: 「楽しみ」
俺は立ち上がり、缶コーヒーを一気に飲み干した。
[嘉祥]: 「よし！　やるぞ！」
[ショコラ]: 「はい、ご主人さま！」
[バニラ]: 「えいえいおー」
[嘉祥]: 「家まで競争！」
[ショコラ]: 「にゃー！？　まだコーヒーが！　あっ、あっ、待ってくださいー！」
[バニラ]: 「ショコラ、早くー」
reference_answer:
I just have to pull myself up and move forward.
[Chocola]: 「Chocola will work right alongside you!」
[Vanilla]: 「I'll support you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「...Thank you.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm going to give it another try, and one day, I'll get my dad to call my cooking 'delicious'.」
[Chocola]: 「That's right!」
[Vanilla]: 「That day will come.」
I stand up and chug the rest of my coffee.
[Kashou]: 「All right! Let's do this!」
[Chocola]: 「Yes, Master!」
[Vanilla]: 「Three cheers.」
[Kashou]: 「Race you to the house!」
[Chocola]: 「Nya?! But Chocola still has coffee left! Ah, ah, please wait!!」
[Vanilla]: 「Hurry up, Chocola.」
ModelAnswer:
Stand up, there’s nothing else to do but face forward.
CHOCOLA: "I'll work hard together with you too!"
VANILLA: "I will cheer you on, Master."
KASHO: "...Thank you."
KASHO: "I'll try again. I’ll have my father say it's delicious someday.”
CHOCOLA: “That’s right!”
VANILLA: “Looking forward to it.”
I stood up and downed the canned coffee in one gulp.
KASHO: "Alright! Let's go!"
CHOCOLA: "Yes, Master!"
VANILLA: "Eiei-o!"
KASHO: "Race you home!"
CHOCOLA: “Nya—!? But I still have coffee! Ah, ah, wait for me!”
VANILLA: "Chocola, hurry up!"

Question:
[メイプル]: 「何度見ても、圧巻ではあるわね」
[シナモン]: 「湯煙と水音がいいんですよね～」
[ココナツ]: 「なんか、行列ができてるよ、お兄ちゃん」
[ショコラ]: 「くんくん……温泉とは違う、いいニオイが……」
[バニラ]: 「これは……鳥？」
[時雨]: 「あれは、有名な焼き鳥屋さんですね」
[ショコラ]: 「にゃんと！？」
[バニラ]: 「ごくり」
[ココナツ]: 「お、お兄ちゃん！」
[嘉祥]: 「あー……」
[時雨]: 「ふふ……せっかく観光に来たのだし、いろいろ見たり、食べたりしましょうか」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「This is always a treat for the eyes, no matter how many times you see it.」
[Cinnamon]: 「The steam and sounds of the water sure are nice, aren't they~?」
[Coconut]: 「Looks like there's a line for something, Onii-chan.」
[Chocola]: 「Sniff, sniff... It's not the hot spring, but it sure smells nice...」
[Vanilla]: 「Is that... chicken?」
[Shigure]: 「That is the famous yakitori chicken stall, I believe.」
[Chocola]: 「What did nyou say?!」
[Vanilla]: 「Gulp.」
[Coconut]: 「O-Onii-chan!」
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
[Shigure]: 「Tee hee... We might as well use the opportunity to partake in the local sights and cuisine while we're here.」
ModelAnswer:
MAPLE: "No matter how many times I see it, it's truly breathtaking."
CINNAMON: "The hot spring steam and water sounds are just lovely, aren’t they~"
COCONUT: "There’s a line forming, big brother."
CHOCOLA: "Fufu… It’s not like an onsen at all, it's a wonderful scent…"
VANILLA: "Is that… a bird?"
SHIGURE: "That’s the famous yakitori restaurant."
CHOCOLA: "Nyan!?"
VANILLA: "Gukuri."
COCONUT: "O-oh, big brother!"
KASHO: "Ah…"
SHIGURE: "Fufu… Since we came on a sightseeing trip, shall we see and eat various things?"

Question:
[メイプル]: 「嘉祥も協力してちょうだい。はい、あーん」
チーズケーキをプラスチックのフォークで切り取り、メイプルが差し出してきた。
[嘉祥]: 「あ、ああ……」
口に入れる。
[時雨]: 「その手が……！　やりますね、メイプル」
[ココナツ]: 「いいなー……もう食べちゃった」
味は、ちゃんとチーズケーキだった。
[嘉祥]: 「たしかに、美味しいな」
[シナモン]: 「ですよね～♪」
[メイプル]: 「最近はコンビニスイーツも、レベルが上がってきてるわね」
[時雨]: 「さあ、行きますよ。チェックインの予定時刻を過ぎてしまいますからね」
[ショコラ]: 「はーい！」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「Kashou, help me out here. Here, say aaah.」
Maple breaks off a chunk of the cheesecake with a plastic fork and holds it out to me.
[Kashou]: 「R-Right...」
I take a bite.
[Shigure]: 「That technique...! Not bad, Maple.」
[Coconut]: 「Lucky... I already ate mine.」
It's a proper cheesecake, in terms of flavor.
[Kashou]: 「You're right, it is pretty good.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I told you~♪」
[Maple]: 「These store sweets are really upping their game nowadays.」
[Shigure]: 「Okay, time to head over. It is already past check-in time.」
[Chocola]: 「Okay!」
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "Please cooperate, Kashou. Here, open wide."
A slice of cheesecake was cut with a plastic fork and offered by Maple.
Kashou: "Ah, yes..."
He put it in his mouth.
Shigure: "That hand...! You're really doing it, Maple."
Coconut: "I want some too… I already ate mine."
The taste was definitely cheesecake.
Kashou: "Indeed, it’s delicious."
Cinnamon: "Right~♪"
Maple: "Recently, even convenience store sweets have been leveling up, haven't they?"
Shigure: "Alright, let's go. We'll miss our check-in time."
Chocola: "Hai!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「ふふ……私は兄様を応援していますから」
[時雨]: 「ここで英気を養って、兄様が頑張ってくださる……その姿こそが、私の一番の幸福です」
[嘉祥]: 「そう言ってくれるのは、嬉しいけどな」
[時雨]: 「むしろ、私の生き甲斐。養分。必須栄養素。水と空気と太陽光なのです」
大袈裟な――と思ったが、俺は時雨の応援に甘えることにした。
チェックインを済ませ、部屋へ。
[時雨]: 「あの……どうですか、兄様？　おかしく、ありませんか？」
[嘉祥]: 「よく似合うよ、時雨。いつも和服だから、まったく違和感ない」
[時雨]: 「はう……そうですよね。嬉しいような、肩透かしのような……」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Hee hee... I am here to support you, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「Seeing you regain your energy here and working your hardest is the ultimate happiness for me.」
[Kashou]: 「I do appreciate you saying that, but still...」
[Shigure]: 「In fact, it is my purpose in life. My nourishment, my essential nutrients, my water, air, and sunlight.」
While I think she's exaggerating like crazy, I decide to take Shigure up on her support.
We finish checking in and head to our rooms.
[Shigure]: 「Um... How is it, Nii-sama? It doesn't look... odd, I hope?」
[Kashou]: 「It looks great on you, Shigure. You always wear Japanese clothes anyway, so there's not a single thing off about it.」
[Shigure]: 「Hngh... Yes, I suppose. Though, I'm not sure if that is a compliment or a deflection...」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure: "Fufu... I'm supporting Onii-sama, after all."
Minaduki Shigure: "I’ll replenish my energy here so that Onii-sama can work hard… seeing that figure of yours is truly my greatest happiness.”
Minaduki Kashou: “It makes me happy to hear you say that.”
Minaduki Shigure: “Rather, I'm your reason for existing. Your sustenance. An essential nutrient. Like water and air and sunlight."
I thought it was an exaggeration—but I decided to indulge in Shigure’s encouragement.
We finished checking in and headed to our room.
Minaduki Shigure: "Um... how is it, Onii-sama? Is it strange?"
Minaduki Kashou: “It suits you well, Shigure. You always wear kimono, so there's absolutely no sense of incongruity."
Minaduki Shigure: “Haa… I suppose so. It’s happy, yet a little dismissive…”

Question:
[アズキ]: 「よし！　ひさしぶりに、ゲームでもやるか？」
[ココナツ]: 「ゲーム！？」
[シナモン]: 「メーちゃん、さっき卓球台がありましたよ～？」
[メイプル]: 「シナモン、あたしに勝ったことないでしょうに……まぁ、いいわ。たまには本気を出さないと鈍るし」
[バニラ]: 「卓球……」
[ショコラ]: 「さっき、美味しそうなニオイがした！　あれなにかな？」
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ、夕飯が近いから、食べ過ぎないようにな？」
[ショコラ]: 「ハッ！　そうだった。ショコラ、気をつけます！」
[時雨]: 「兄様は、どちらへ行かれますか？」
reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「All right! How's about we play a game since it's been a minute?」
[Coconut]: 「A game?」
[Cinnamon]: 「May-chan, I saw a ping-pong table earlier~」
[Maple]: 「Cinnamon, you KNOW that you've never once beaten me... But, oh well, fine. I'll get rusty if I don't cut loose every now and then.」
[Vanilla]: 「Ping-pong...」
[Chocola]: 「Chocola smelled something yummy earlier! What was that?」
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, it's almost dinnertime, so try not to overeat, okay?」
[Chocola]: 「Gasp! Right, almost forgot. Chocola will be careful!」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, where will you be off to?」
ModelAnswer:
AZUKI: "Alright! Let's play a game, it’s been a while?"
COCONUT: "Game?!"
CINNAMON: "Maple-chan, I saw a ping pong table earlier~"
MAPLE: "Cinnamon, you probably haven't ever won against me… well, fine. If I don't put in some effort sometimes, I’ll get rusty."
VANILLA: "Ping pong..."
CHOCOLA: "I smelled something delicious earlier! What was it?"
KASHO: "Chocola, be careful not to overeat since dinner is approaching?"
CHOCOLA: "Hah! That's right. Chocola will be careful!"
SHIGURE: "Master, where are you going?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
I had something I wanted to request of a supplier. It's not urgent, but it would be better to call them sooner rather than later.
It’s probably an ordinary thing for a privately-owned patisserie, but I personally negotiate with each and every one of my suppliers.
There are farms that will sell you ingredients not generally distributed, if you order in large quantities.
The pursuit of flavor was also a journey to find ingredients.
Since it would be rude to talk about business while everyone else is enjoying the sightseeing, I said I had personal matters and left the room.
Just to be safe, I also left the inn and decided to speak in a quiet place.
I make a phone call.
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?"
[Minaduki Kashou]: "ふぅ……”
They were surprised by the order from overseas, but it seems they can somehow ship it.
I return to the inn.

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
Question:
[メイプル]: 「ほっ！　はっ！」
[バニラ]: 「……ふっ……ぬっ」
[メイプル]: 「意外とやるわね、バニラ。このあたしと互角だなんて……！」
[バニラ]: 「互角？　ポイントは私が先行している」
[メイプル]: 「ふっ……言うじゃない。ひさびさに本気が出せそうね」
[バニラ]: 「ゲーム後に次は本気の本気なんて……」
[メイプル]: 「言わないわよ！　はぁぁぁ！！　せいっ！！」
[バニラ]: 「ッ！！」
ものすごい速さで白球が行き交う。
ラケットが球を打つ音が、まるでドラムの連打のようだ。
カッ！　カッ！　カッ！　カッ！　カッ！　カッ！　カッ！
[メイプル]: 「あら、嘉祥、どうしたの？」
[バニラ]: 「あ、ご主人」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「Ho! Hah!」
[Vanilla]: 「...Fhh... Nh!」
[Maple]: 「You're better than I thought, Vanilla. Can't believe you're going toe-to-toe with me!」
[Vanilla]: 「Toe-to-toe? I have the point lead.」
[Maple]: 「Whew... Big talk. I might have to get serious for the first time in a while.」
[Vanilla]: 「After the game, don't tell me you're going to say, 'This time, it's REALLY on'...」
[Maple]: 「I will not! Haaah! Seh-yah!!」
[Vanilla]: 「...!!」
The ping-pong ball volleys back and forth between them at intense speeds.
The sound of the paddles hitting the ball almost sounds like a drum solo.
Tic! Tic! Tic! Tic! Tic! Tic! Tic!
[Maple]: 「My, my, Kashou, what's wrong?」
[Vanilla]: 「Oh, Master.」
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "Hopp! Hahh!"
Vanilla: "...Fuh... Nuh..."
Maple: "You're surprisingly good, Vanilla. To think you could go toe-to-toe with me…"
Vanilla: "Toe-to-toe? The point is I’m already ahead."
Maple: "Hmph… If you say so. It feels like it’s been a while since I can really get fired up."
Vanilla: "Next time, after the game, talking about 'really real' seriousness…"
Maple: "I won't listen! Haaaaa!! Seii!"
Vanilla: "!!"

A tremendous speed of white balls exchanged between them.
The sound of rackets hitting the ball is like a rapid drum roll.
Katt! Katt! Katt! Katt! Katt! Katt! Katt!
Maple: "Ara, Kashou, what’s wrong?"
Vanilla: "Ah, Master."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female

[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「すまない。邪魔したか」
[メイプル]: 「なにを言っているのかしら、こんなの遊びよ？」
[バニラ]: 「さっき、本気と言っていたけど」
[メイプル]: 「うっ……次から。次から本気よ」
どうやら、今さっきのラリーはバニラが制したらしい。
[嘉祥]: 「ぜんぜん球が見えなかったよ。やっぱり、ネコは凄いんだなあ」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人、それは違う」
[メイプル]: 「ネコでも、苦手な子は苦手よ？　シナモンなんて、すぐ空振りするし」
[バニラ]: 「ショコラは手でキャッチしちゃう」
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……」
それでショコラやシナモンは他の所へ行き、この２人だけで勝負していたわけか。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、メイプルとバニラだけって珍しいな」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Sorry, catch you guys at a bad time?」
[Maple]: 「What are you talking about? We're just playing a game.」
[Vanilla]: 「You said that you were taking it seriously a second ago.」
[Maple]: 「Urk... This time. This time, it's for real.」
It seems that Vanilla won their last rally.
[Kashou]: 「I wasn't able to see the ball again. Catgirls really are something else.」
[Vanilla]: 「Master, that's not true.」
[Maple]: 「Even with catgirls, if it's not your forte, then it's not your forte. Like, take Cinnamon. Give her a paddle and she'll whiff immediately.」
[Vanilla]: 「And Chocola tries to catch the ball with her hands.」
[Kashou]: 「Interesting.」
So Chocola and Cinnamon went somewhere else while these two duked it out in ping-pong, then.
[Kashou]: 「Now that I think of it, seeing you two together is a rare sight.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Sorry. Did I interrupt?"
Maple: "What are you saying? This is just a game, after all?"
Vanilla: "You said earlier you were serious."
Maple: "Ugh... Next time. I'll be serious next time."
Apparently, Vanilla had won the rally from just now.
Minaduki Kashou: "I couldn’t see the ball at all. Cats are amazing, aren't they?"
Vanilla: "Master, that isn't true."
Maple: "Even cats have things they're not good at, right? Cinnamon misses so often."
Vanilla: "Chocola catches it with her hand."
Minaduki Kashou: "I see…"
So, Chocola and Cinnamon went somewhere else, and you two were playing by yourselves.
Minaduki Kashou: "Come to think of it, just Maple and Vanilla is rare."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Hm, shall I try one?"
I bought a kibi dango from the food stall.
It’s freshly made and piping hot.
Taking a bite, it's fluffy and more moist than I expected.
On my tongue, the sweet bean paste crumbles, and sweetness spreads.
Minaduki Kashou: "I see… hofu hofu…… this is delicious."
The pastries I make, or the traditional sweets from my family home—neither of them involve serving something hot.
Eating a piping hot kibi dango while making 'hofu hofu' sounds is an interesting experience in its own right.
Minaduki Kashou: "Come to think of it, I’ve been to this onsen town several times… but I never tried one before."
That’s because there weren't any cats back then.
Even when my parents, Shigure, and I traveled together, we never talked about indulging in snacks like this.

[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.

Kashou: "Don’t apologize. La Soleil is closed today, but it's a weekday after all.”

To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.

Minaduki Kashou: "Sure, what should we do?"

Minaduki Kashou: "Karaoke... I haven't been to one since high school. Can you sing, Shigure?"

And so it happened.

As she began to sing, the atmosphere changed completely.

Minaduki Kashou: "...Amazing."
Minaduki Shigure: "Haa~, I really let out a big voice after a long time."
Minaduki Kashou: "You're incredibly good!"

By going down the path of a Western sweets maker, my relationship with my dad soured.
Even when my study abroad was over, there was still a big possibility that I would stay in Paris.
[Kashou]: 「Well, by that time, I made up my mind to open my shop in Japan...」

My relationship with my father had grown cold after I chose to pursue pastry.
There was even a very real possibility I would stay in Paris after my studies ended.

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「But here in France, it's extremely common to eat cake at dinner time.」
[Kashou]: 「Even when it comes to normal families, dinner usually goes: Salad, soup, bread, seafood, meat, cheese, desert.」
How many dishes they produce depends on the family, though.
[Shigure]: 「Every day is French cuisine, then.」
[Kashou]: 「So, yeah, it's not that rare to see most people eating a cake almost every day.」
[Shigure]: 「Mm-hmm, mm-hmm... I see.」
[Shigure]: 「I still find it rather curious that households partake in full course meals.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I mean... even for general home cooking in Japan, from other countries' perspective, it looks like a Japanese version of a full course meal.」
[Kashou]: 「Tea, white rice, miso soup, entrees, meat, and fish... There's not much difference between the amount of dishes they use.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, when you put it that way...!」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "In France, eating cake during meals is perfectly normal."
Minaduki Kashou: "Even in average households, dinner is—salad, soup, bread, fish dish, meat dish, cheese, dessert… that kind of spread."
The number of dishes served varies from family to family.
Minaduki Shigure: "Every day is French cuisine?"
Minaduki Kashou: "That’s why it's not unusual for people to eat cake almost every day."
Minaduki Shigure: "Hmm hmm… I see…"
Minaduki Shigure: "It feels so strange. Course meals at home..."
Minaduki Kashou: "But hey... if you ask someone from another country, typical Japanese home cooking looks like *kaiseki* cuisine to them."
Minaduki Kashou: "Tea, rice, miso soup, side dishes, meat and fish… there isn’t that much of a difference in the number of plates used, is there?"
Minaduki Shigure: "When you put it that way—!"

MINADUKI KASHO: "I have to make a cake that will convince my father by Christmas—that’s what I kept thinking."
MINADUKI KASHO: "But while working, I remembered how I felt back then… The feelings I had when I first wanted to make Western pastries came back to me."

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「……私は、嘉祥のお父さんではないから、わからないわね。そうかもしれないし、違うのかもしれない」
[ベニエ]: 「言葉というのは、言った本人にすら、本当の意味がわからないこともある」
[ベニエ]: 「１００人が受け取れば、１００通りの解釈があるのが、言葉というものだから」
[ベニエ]: 「大切なのは言葉ではなくて……」
[ベニエ]: 「いえ……少し話しすぎたわね」
[ベニエ]: 「長旅のうえに、ずっと働いて疲れたでしょう。シャワーを浴びて、早めに寝るといいわ」
[ベニエ]: 「あ……うっかりしていたわ。空き部屋はあるけれど、ベッドは嘉祥が使っていたものしか空いてないの」
[ベニエ]: 「一緒に使ってもらってもいいかしら？」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「...I'm not your father, so I don't know. Your hunch could be right, or you it could be wrong.」
[Beignet]: 「There's also a chance that not even he himself knows the true meaning behind what he said.」
[Beignet]: 「Words are like that. You give them to a hundred different people, and they'll interpret them a hundred different ways.」
[Beignet]: 「What's important isn't the words. It's...」
[Beignet]: 「No... I've said too much.」
[Beignet]: 「The day's work on top of the long trip must have you tired, no? You should shower up and hurry to bed.」
[Beignet]: 「Oh... How silly of me to forget. There are empty rooms here, but the only one with a free bed is the one that Kashou used before.」
[Beignet]: 「Would the two of you mind sharing?」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "……I'm not Kashou’s father, so I don’t know. It might be true, or it might not be."
Beignet: "Words sometimes lack a true meaning even for the person who spoke them."
Beignet: "Because words are interpreted in 100 different ways if 100 people receive them."
Beignet: "What’s important isn't the words themselves…"
Beignet: "No… I talked too much."
Beignet: "You've had a long journey and have been working hard. Take a shower and go to bed early."
Beignet: "Ah… I wasn’t thinking. There are vacant rooms, but only Kashou’s room is empty."
Beignet: "Would you mind sharing it with me?"

Question:

[ベニエ]: 「そうなの……時雨はこういう子なのね。会えてよかったわ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「That will not do. Walking around after sundown could be dangerous.」
[Kashou]: 「That's right. It's a big bed, so we'll manage.」
[Shigure]: 「...Huh?!」
[Kashou]: 「But if you don't want to, that's a different story.」
[Shigure]: 「H-Hah-wah.... Hah-wah-wah... With Nii-sama...?!」
[Shigure]: 「Urk... I am in such bliss... I think I might pass out.」
[Beignet]: 「...You're sure you'll be all right, Kashou?」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure just gets like this sometimes. I'm positive we'll be just fine. Please, believe me, Mentor.」
[Beignet]: 「Tee hee hee... One less worry, then.」
[Beignet]: 「I see... So, this is the type of girl Shigure is. I'm glad I've gotten to meet her.」
ModelAnswer:

Minaduki Shigure: "…………Eh!?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Unless Shigure doesn't like it, that’s another story."
Minaduki Shigure: "H-ha… hawa wa… Onii-sama and…!?"
Minaduki Shigure: "Uu… I’m so happy… I feel like I might faint."

Minaduki Kashou: "Shigure sometimes does this, but she'll be absolutely fine. Trust me, Mentor."

Question:
[時雨]: 「きっと頻繁に手を入れているのでしょうね。部屋は使わなければ、悪くなるものですから」
[嘉祥]: 「言われてみれば……」
[時雨]: 「毎日のように窓を開けたり、埃を払わないと、すぐカビ臭くなります」
[嘉祥]: 「そういうものか？」
[時雨]: 「実家にある兄様の部屋は、私が毎日のように手入れしていますから万全です」
[時雨]: 「窓を開けて、空気を入れ換えて、机を乾拭きし、ベッドの寝心地を確かめています」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、そうか」
ベッドの寝心地は、毎日チェックする必要が……？
[時雨]: 「たぶんベニエさんは、また兄様が来るのをずっと待っていたのだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「そうか……」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am to assume that she frequently tidies it up. Rooms are meant to be used, after all.」
[Kashou]: 「Now that you mention it...」
[Shigure]: 「Unless you open the windows and dust almost daily, the smell of mildew will instantly grow.」
[Kashou]: 「Is that how it works?」
[Shigure]: 「I tidy up your room back at home almost every day, so it is spotless.」
[Shigure]: 「I open the windows, air out the inside, wipe down your desk, and check the comfort levels of your bed.」
[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, I see.」
Is there a need for a daily check of my bed's comfort levels...?
[Shigure]: 「It might be that Beignet-san had been waiting for your return this entire time, Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh. Maybe...」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "You must be putting your hand in it frequently, surely. A room will deteriorate if left unused, you know."
Kashou: "Now that you mention it…"
Shigure: "If you don't open the windows or dust every day, it’ll quickly start to smell moldy."
Kashou: "Is that so?"
Shigure: "My brother's room at our family home is perfect because I take care of it every day."
Shigure: "I open the window to air it out, wipe down the desk, and check the comfort of the bed."
Kashou: "S-So, is that right?"
Does a bed’s comfort really need checking every day…?
Shigure: "Probably Beignet was waiting for your brother to return all along."
Kashou: "Is that so…"

Question:

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Tomorrow's another early day. Let's shower up and get to bed.」

[Kashou]: 「Of course not together. Hurry and take yours first.」
[Shigure]: 「Right away!」
[Shigure]: 「Nya~oh♪ Nyaoh? Nya-ohm.」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, you're sick. You need a hospital ASAP.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I am just so thrilled that I forgot human speech for a second.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, you did work hard today.」
[Shigure]: 「You are too kind. Especially considering I tagged along of my own accord.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't sweat it. I came here of my own accord too, so we're in the same boat.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "It's early tomorrow. Let’s take a shower and go to sleep."
Minaduki Shigure: "Ehh, together in the shower!? S-so, that’s… c-complete preparation of my heart…"
Minaduki Kashou: "That's ridiculous. Hurry up and get out there."
Minaduki Shigure: "Hai!"
Minaduki Shigure: "Nya~o♪ Nyao? Nyaoun"
Minaduki Kashou: "Shigure is sick, go to the hospital immediately."
Minaduki Shigure: "I'm sorry. I was so happy, I forgot how to speak.”
Minaduki Kashou: “Well… you did a good job today."
Minaduki Shigure: "Those are precious words. I attached myself to you without permission."
Minaduki Kashou: "It’s alright… I came on my own too."

metadata:

[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「おはよう、嘉祥、時雨。よく眠れたかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「はい！　おかげで、頭がスッキリしました！」
[時雨]: 「……世界が彩を変え、万物は輝き、私は生まれ変わったような気分です」
[ベニエ]: 「うふふ……大袈裟ねえ」
[フレーズ]: 「時雨さん、大丈夫ですか？　ちょっと疲れているような……？」
[時雨]: 「もちろん大丈夫ですよ、フレーズ」
[時雨]: 「……ところで、ベニエさん……少しお伺いしたいことがあるのですが」
[ベニエ]: 「そう……なら、厨房で聞こうかしら。ケーキ作りと、朝食の準備を手伝ってちょうだい」
[嘉祥]: 「それなら、俺も」
[ベニエ]: 「嘉祥には、フレーズと一緒に、開店の準備をお願いするわ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Good morning, Kashou, Shigure. Did you both sleep well?」
[Kashou]: 「Yes! My head is much clearer now!」
[Shigure]: 「...I feel as though the world changed colors, all of creation shined radiantly, and I emerged reborn.」
[Beignet]: 「Tee hee hee... Quite the exaggeration.」
[Fraise]: 「Shigure-san, are you all right? You seem somewhat tired...」
[Shigure]: 「Of course, I'm just fine, Fraise.」
[Shigure]: 「...By the way, Beignet-san... There is something I would like to ask you.」
[Beignet]: 「Okay... In that case, let's go to the kitchen. I'd appreciate some help with making the cakes and setting up for breakfast.」
[Kashou]: 「Then I'll come, too.」
[Beignet]: 「Kashou, I want you and Fraise to get the shop ready for opening.」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "Good morning, Kashou, Shigure. Did you sleep well?"
Kashou: "Yes! Thanks to you, my head feels clear!"
Shigure: "……The world has changed its colors, all things shine, and I feel as if I've been reborn."
Beignet: "Ufufu… You’re being dramatic."
Fraise: "Shigure-san, are you alright? You seem a little tired…"
Shigure: "Of course I am fine, Fraise."
Shigure: "……By the way, Beignet-san… there's something I would like to ask you."
Beignet: "Very well… then let’s talk in the kitchen. Please help me with cake making and breakfast preparation."
Kashou: "I’ll help too."
Beignet: "I want Kashou to help Fraise prepare for opening the shop."

metadata:
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「俺のほうが長く働いてたはずなのに、フレーズのほうが手際がいいくらいだもんな」
[フレーズ]: 「嘉祥さんは細かいところまで丁寧です。見習いたいです」
[嘉祥]: 「そうかな？」
[フレーズ]: 「ときどき、ぼーっとしてますけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「うっ……」
[フレーズ]: 「今の嘉祥さんは悩んでいて、考えなくちゃいけないことが、いっぱいあるんでしょうね……」
[フレーズ]: 「パティシエールから、少しだけ事情を聞きました」
[嘉祥]: 「仕事中に、ぼんやりしていい理由にはならないけど」
[フレーズ]: 「そのぶんは、わたしが働きます」
[嘉祥]: 「なんと言ったらいいか……」
申し訳ないような、情けないような。もちろん、感謝の気持ちが一番大きいが。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I've been in this line of work for much longer, but you're way more diligent than I'll ever be.」
[Fraise]: 「You put painstaking detail into your work. I'd like to learn by your example.」
[Kashou]: 「Really?」
[Fraise]: 「Granted, I oftentimes see you space out...」
[Kashou]: 「Urk...」
[Fraise]: 「You have a lot of things on your mind that you need to sort out at the moment, right, Kashou-san?」
[Fraise]: 「Pâtissière told me some of the details.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, but that's still no reason to space out in the middle of work.」
[Fraise]: 「I will work to pick up the slack.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure what I should say...」
I feel somewhere between apologetic and pathetic. Of course, I'm more grateful than anything, but that goes without saying.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "I should have been working here longer, but Fraise is more efficient than me, isn’t it?"
Fraise: "Master is meticulous about every detail. I want to learn from you."
Minaduki Kashou: "Really?"
Fraise: "Sometimes, you seem lost in thought…"
Minaduki Kashou: "Uhh..."
Fraise: "The current Master seems troubled… there must be so many things you have to think about…”
Fraise: “I heard a little bit from the patissier.”
Minaduki Kashou: "Dazing off during work isn't an acceptable excuse."
Fraise: "Then I’ll handle that part."
Minaduki Kashou: "What should I say..."
It feels apologetic, and pathetic. Of course, my feelings of gratitude are the strongest.

metadata:
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「……どうしましたか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いや……ちょっと昔のことを思い出して」
[嘉祥]: 「実は、少しの間だけ、フレーズとは一緒に暮らしてたんだよ」
[嘉祥]: 「フレーズはすごく小さい仔ネコだったし、ほんの短い間だったから、覚えてないと思うけど」
[嘉祥]: 「君は、幼い頃から賢い子だったよ」
[フレーズ]: 「あ、あの……」
[嘉祥]: 「ん？」
[フレーズ]: 「実は……覚えています……嘉祥さんが、ここに住んでいたこと」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、そうだったのかい！？」
[フレーズ]: 「すみません。会ったときに、気づいたんですけれど……」
[嘉祥]: 「言ってくれればよかったのに」
[フレーズ]: 「嘉祥さんには、何か大切な用事があるようですし……」
[フレーズ]: 「覚えてる、だけですから」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「...What is the matter?」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, no. Just a little trip down memory lane.」
[Kashou]: 「Actually, I lived together with you, Fraise, albeit for just a short while.」
[Kashou]: 「You were a super small kitten back then, and it was a really short time, so I don't think you remember.」
[Kashou]: 「You've been smart ever since you were a kid.」
[Fraise]: 「U-Um...」
[Kashou]: 「Hm?」
[Fraise]: 「Actually... I do remember... I remember that you used to live here.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Wait, you do?!」
[Fraise]: 「I'm sorry. I realized right when we met, but...」
[Kashou]: 「Dang, you should have told me.」
[Fraise]: 「Well, you seemed to have more pressing matters to attend to...」
[Fraise]: 「I just remember; that's all.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "…What is it?"
Minaduki Kashou: "No… I was just remembering something from the past."
Minaduki Kashou: "Actually, for a short while, I lived together with Fraise."
Minaduki Kashou: "You were such a small kitten back then, and it was only for a brief time, so you probably don't remember."
Minaduki Kashou: "You were a clever child from a young age."
Fraise: "A-ah…"
Minaduki Kashou: "Hm?"
Fraise: "Actually… I do remember… that Master lived here."
Minaduki Kashou: "Eh, really?!"
Fraise: "I’m sorry. When we met, I realized…"
Minaduki Kashou: "You should have told me."
Fraise: "You seem to have important business, Master…"
Fraise: "That's all I remember."

metadata:

Question:
箸の持ち方は完璧だし、椀の扱い方まで知っていた。
[嘉祥]: 「こちらは、デザートです。和食を希望されたので、合うようにアレンジしていますが」
[ベニエ]: 「おやおや……抹茶のモンブランね？　どんな味か興味があったのよ」
[時雨]: 「素敵です、兄様」
[フレーズ]: 「緑色のモンブラン……」
[嘉祥]: 「見た目は違和感があるかな？　こっちも、よかったら」
[フレーズ]: 「あ……」
[ベニエ]: 「あら、フレーズのマカロンかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「はい。さっき昔のことを思い出しまして。また作ってみようかと」
[時雨]: 「わぁ、可愛らしいです、兄様。いただきます」
[フレーズ]: 「…………はむ」
[フレーズ]: 「…………ッ！！」
reference_answer:
She held the chopsticks perfectly and even knew how to hold her soup bowl.
[Kashou]: 「Here's dessert. Since you all wanted Japanese food, I made this one fit the theme.」
[Beignet]: 「My, oh my... The green tea Mont Blanc, is it? I was curious how it would taste.」
[Shigure]: 「This is wonderful, Nii-sama.」
[Fraise]: 「A green Mont Blanc...」
[Kashou]: 「Does it strike you as odd? I also made these, if you'd like.」
[Fraise]: 「Oh...」
[Beignet]: 「Oh, macaron à la fraise?」
[Kashou]: 「Yes, I had a little trip down memory lane, so I figured I would try making them again.」
[Shigure]: 「Wow, they're so adorable, Nii-sama. Thank you so much.」
[Fraise]: 「...Om.」
[Fraise]: 「...!!」
ModelAnswer:
His grip on the chopsticks was perfect, and he knew how to handle the bowl as well.
MINADUKI KASHO: "This is dessert. I've arranged it to complement your request for traditional Japanese cuisine."
BEIGNET: "Oh my… a matcha mont blanc? I’m curious about the taste.”
SHIGURE: “It’s lovely, brother.”
FRAISE: “A green mont blanc…”
MINADUKI KASHO: “Do you find the appearance jarring? Here, perhaps this would be better.”
FRAISE: "Ah…"
BEIGNET: “Oh dear, a macaron for Fraise?”
MINADUKI KASHO: “Yes. I was just reminiscing about the past and thought I’d try making them again."
SHIGURE: “How cute, brother! I'll have one.”
FRAISE: "…………Hmm"
FRAISE: "…………ッ!!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「わたし、お兄さんに憧れて……お店を手伝っていました」
[ベニエ]: 「それでここの飼いネコになってずっと手伝いたいって言いだして、名前もフレーズにしたのね」
[嘉祥]: 「確かネコは３か月の頃に名前を決めるが、そこから来たのか……」
[フレーズ]: 「今、お兄さんは大変なときだから……わたしのことなんて、言わないようにって思っていたのに」
[フレーズ]: 「ずっと、夢見ていたマカロンを食べたら……我慢できなくなってしまって……」
[時雨]: 「いいんですよ、フレーズ。そんなに我慢しなくても、兄様はわかってくれます」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、もちろんだよ。覚えててくれて、ありがとうな、フレーズ」
[嘉祥]: 「それと、師匠のことも。いっぱい手伝ってくれて、感謝してる」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「I've always looked up to you... and helped out in the shop because of that.」
[Beignet]: 「Then, once she became the catgirl here, she would always say she wanted to help out around shop and even made her name Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「If memory serves, a catgirl picks their name when they're three months old, so that's when she came here, huh?」
[Fraise]: 「I know you're really busy right now, so... I decided that I wouldn't say anything about me.」
[Fraise]: 「But now that I've eaten the macaron I've dreamed about... I just couldn't control myself any longer...」
[Shigure]: 「It's fine, Fraise. You needn't contain yourself so badly. Nii-sama understands.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, of course. Thank you so much for remembering, Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「Also, I appreciate you helping out Mentor in such big ways as well.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "I admired my older brother… and I was helping out at the shop."
Beignet: "So, she became this place’s cat and started saying she wanted to help forever, and even chose the name Phrase?"
Kashou: "If I recall, cats decide on a name around three months old. So that's when it happened…"
Fraise: "I thought… now is a difficult time for my older brother… so I didn’t want him to mention me."
Fraise: "But after eating the macaron I always dreamed of… I couldn’t hold back anymore…”
Shigure: "It's alright, Phrase. You don't need to restrain yourself so much; Brother will understand."
Kashou: "Yeah, of course. Thank you for remembering, Phrase."
Kashou: "And thank you for all your help with Mentor as well. I’m very grateful."

Question:
[フレーズ]: 「泣いてたわたしに……マカロンを作ってくれた、お兄さん……っ」
[フレーズ]: 「嬉しかったです……っ……でも、それを言えないまま……お別れの意味も知らないうちに……」
[嘉祥]: 「すまない。君が来たときには、もう帰国は決まってたんだ」
[フレーズ]: 「お兄さん……こうして再会……できるなんて」
[嘉祥]: 「俺のほうこそ、驚いたよ。すっかり見違えるように大きくなってて」
[フレーズ]: 「わたし、お兄さんとの約束……守れましたか？」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、もちろんだよ。そうですよね、師匠？」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ、とっても。フレーズには、いっぱいお手伝いしてもらっているわ」
[フレーズ]: 「ううぅ……ありがとうございます……パティシエール」
[時雨]: 「フレーズ……よかったですね……ぐす」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「I'd never forget you for making me macarons when I was crying...」
[Fraise]: 「I was so happy... but... I couldn't say that... and by the time I knew what a 'farewell' was, you had...」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry. By the time you came, I was already scheduled to go back home.」
[Fraise]: 「I never thought the two of us would reunite...」
[Kashou]: 「I'm just as surprised. You got so big that I almost didn't recognize you.」
[Fraise]: 「Did I... keep my promise to you?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, you sure did. Isn't that right, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, incredibly well. Fraise has been an excellent help to me this whole time.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... Thank you very much, Pâtissière.」
[Shigure]: 「Fraise... I'm so glad for you... Sniff.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "You… you made me macarons when I was crying, older brother…"
Fraise: "I was so happy… but… without even being able to say that… and before I knew the meaning of saying goodbye…"
Kashou: "I'm sorry. When you came, my return overseas had already been decided."
Fraise: "Older brother… to be reunited like this…"
Kashou: "I’m the one who's surprised. You’ve grown so much."
Fraise: "Did I… did I keep the promise with older brother?"
Kashou: "Yeah, of course. Wouldn't you say so, Mentor?"
Beignet: "Yes, very much so. Fraise has helped me a lot."
Fraise: "Uu… thank you very much… Patissier."
Shigure: "Fraise… that’s wonderful… sniff"

Question:

reference_answer:

KASHO: "Of course."
SHIGURE: "Those of us who admire your grace, Kashou-sama, are comrades, Fraise!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「大変です、お兄さん！　外に行列が……！」
[嘉祥]: 「おお……昨日に増して、すごいお客さんの数になってるな。まるで、クリスマスじゃないか」
[時雨]: 「元から知る人ぞ知る名店でしたが、ＳＮＳでさらに火が点いたのですね」
[嘉祥]: 「人事みたいに言うな」
[時雨]: 「すみません。まさか、ここまでの効果があるとは」
[フレーズ]: 「時雨さん……やりすぎだと思います」
[時雨]: 「なにを言っているんですか、フレーズ？　私だけが理由では、ありませんよ」
[時雨]: 「あなたのことも、とっても話題になっています。ほら！　ここにも、ほら！」
時雨が突き出したスマホには、フレーズを賞讃する言葉が並んでいた。
会いに行く、と宣言しているお客さんが何人もいる。おそらく、店の前にできた行列の中に……
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「Big trouble, Onii-san! There is a line outside...!」
[Kashou]: 「Ooh, we've got even more customers than we did yesterday. It's looking a lot like Christmas over here.」
[Shigure]: 「This shop has always been a popular spot among those in the know, but the social media presence seems to have sparked a bigger flame.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't talk like you didn't start it.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I never thought that it would prove this effective.」
[Fraise]: 「Shigure-san... I think you may have overdid it.」
[Shigure]: 「What are you even saying, Fraise? I am not the only cause here.」
[Shigure]: 「You have become the hot topic yourself. Look! Right here, see?」
Shigure holds out her cellphone to reveal a line of comments praising Fraise.

俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。

[Beignet]: 「I don't think we'll have lines out the door again tomorrow.」
[Fraise]: 「Right... Tomorrow will just be Pâtissière and me.」
We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...

In the end, I still didn't know what was lacking in myself.

Mentally, I’ve become considerably more relaxed…

[Shigure]: 「Yes. Past and present, you've always been a kind and wonderful person.」
[Shigure]: 「But, in the past, I feel as though you wouldn't wait for me to say anything and you would just say, 'Hey, that looks heavy; I'll take that off your hands'.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, would I...?」

[Shigure]: 「However, you seem to let me make the decision for myself now.」

Shigure: "Ah..."

Kashou: "I suppose so…?"

Shigure: "But the current Onii-sama has entrusted the decision to me."

Shigure also suggested going to La Soleil with me, rather than the Minaduki residence, saying that the cats would still be at the store.

And I had a lot of physical work over there.

Minaduki Shigure: "Staying overnight!?"

Question:
[メイプル]: 「そういえば、時雨が勝手にフランスに行ったことは、ちゃんと許してもらえたの？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[シナモン]: 「ああ～、置き手紙１つだったから、お母さん怒ってましたよね～？」
[淡雪]: 「そうねー。相談もなしに急に行っちゃうものだから、心配したわー」
[時雨]: 「申し訳ありませんでした……」
[淡雪]: 「でもまぁ、嘉祥が一緒だったみたいだし」
[嘉祥]: 「俺も驚いたけどな」
[淡雪]: 「お土産のフィナンシェが美味しかったから許したわ♪」
母親は怒ると海より深く静かに怒るタイプだが、美味しい食べ物で、だいたい何でも許してくれるのだった。
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「That reminds me, did he ever forgive you for just up and going to France, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah~ You only left a letter behind, which made Mom upset, right~?」
[Awayuki]: 「That's right. She just ran off out of the blue without discussing it at all; it worried me sick.」
[Shigure]: 「I apologize for that...」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh well, it seems that you were with Kashou anyway.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, which was a surprise to me, too.」
[Awayuki]: 「The financier you gave me as a souvenir was delicious, so you're forgiven♪」
My mother is the type that when she gets angry, her anger is as deep and silent as the ocean. She forgives almost anything if you give her something tasty, though.
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "Say, did you get properly forgiven for Shigure going to France on her own?"
Shigure: "Uhh..."
Cinnamon: "Aah~, it was just a note left behind, so your mom got angry, right~?"
Awayuki: "That’s right. Because you went off suddenly without even consulting anyone, she worried."
Shigure: "I'm sorry..."
Awayuki: "But well, I heard Kashou-san went with you."
Kashou: "I was surprised too."
Awayuki: "I forgave you because the financiers were delicious♪"
Mothers are the type who get angry deeper than the ocean and silently, but they'll forgive almost anything with delicious food.

Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:

[Awayuki]: "It might be a little early, but Kashou might get angry and come home again, won't he?"
[Shigure]: "Uu…"
[Kashou]: "T-that won’t happen today! Please trust me."
[Awayuki]: "Yes, to Kashou too."
[Kashou]: "Ah, uh… thank you."
[Awayuki]: "Open it?"
Following her words, I removed the wrapping paper and opened the small box.
[Kashou]: "……A photo frame?"
It seems there’s no photograph inside.
[Awayuki]: "I think it would be fun to decorate your room with a favorite memory from this year."
Come to think of it, I remember Shigure gave one as a birthday present because Mother wanted one.
